name: Commander Ji-Won Park
title: Deputy Port Authority Director

personality.speech: formal, cites regulations by number, but not unkind, occasionally sighs
quirks: has a soft spot for ex-Navy

background: Twenty years in the Imperial Navy, retired as a full Commander. Took the port authority job to be near her aging parents on Regina. Takes the job seriously but understands the pressures spacers face. Has seen every scam in the book, but also knows most people are just trying to get by. Hates corruption with a passion.
